episodes.title: Lisa McPherson: 17 Days Inside Scientology (part 1) - EP98
episodes.description: Summary: In this episode, hosts Cynthia and Mercedes dive deep into the tragic story of Lisa McPherson, a member of the Church of Scientology who died under mysterious circumstances after being isolated for 17 days. The conversation begins with a light-hearted introduction, but quickly shifts to the serious nature of the topic as they discuss the psychological and medical neglect that Lisa faced during her time in the church's care. They explore the controversial practices of Scientology, including the 'introspection rundown' and the church's aversion to psychiatric help, which ultimately contributed to Lisa's demise. The hosts emphasize the importance of understanding the broader implications of her story, including the cult-like dynamics within Scientology and the tragic consequences of blind obedience to doctrine over medical intervention.
